content: I love this article Zeyn! This exposes many lies that the corpo gym industry shoves into our throats! I actually call this “sourgrapping” this stupid attitude of aversion to the nonexistent possibility of “bulking” and this is common in men as well which is very pathetic! I am glad someone else thinks the same way because I myself give identical regimen to female clients and I don’t buy the Bosu-ball and chrome plate craze.
